item.source: How do i change item prices of shops?

item.title: How do i change item prices of shops?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Since you just want to change the shop price and probably the alching prices too…

Here is an example:

item = 4151	Abyssal_whip	A_weapon_from_the_abyss.	200000	200000	200000	0	82	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	82	0

The 200000 is the Shop Price and alch prices.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change item prices of shops?

item.title: How do i change item prices of shops?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Yes, the number after the Item’s ‘description’ is the Shop Price I believe. The first 3 numbers are the shop price, high alch, and low alch. Not sure if in that order, but those are the first three numbers.
